thread.section_title: American Frame americanframe.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of American Frame americanframe.com | www.americanframe.com
thread.title: Chris
thread.title_full: American Frame americanframe.com reviewed by Chris

author: Chris
title: Chris
text:
I have been ordering from American Frame for years and have great experiences every time. Great value frames always packed up properly and easy to assemble.
Very recently I got a frame and one of the 3 mats was the wrong color. This was the first issue I've ever had. They very quickly made the right mat and shipped it fast. The whole issue was very easy to resolve and taken care of in about 2 days which is amazing.
I wish more online retailers were this good!
